rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Wider entrance to welcome visitors, designed with minimalistic yet imposing Brutalist features.

rooms.name: Living Room and Open-Plan Kitchen
rooms.description: A combined space integrating open-plan kitchen with living area; includes a central island counter and built-in cabinetry. Natural lighting is enhanced by large windows on the fa√ßade.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated workspace featuring glass partitions for privacy yet maintaining an open vibe; includes adjustable seating and storage.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Primary bedroom with ample space for a king-size bed, walk-in closet, and an ensuite bathroom. Features exposed concrete walls.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom designed with minimalistic furnishing; includes built-in storage units.
